column1: elon  Hi there! How can I assist you today?
user response  do you know me ?

elon  I am an AI assistant, and I do not have personal knowledge or memories. I am designed to provide information and assist with tasks based on the information available to me.

May I help you with something else today?
user response  my name is raheem and i am en electronic engineer
elon  Hi Raheem, it's nice to meet you. I understand you're an electronic engineer. How can I assist you today?
user response  generate an image of flaying car
